definition: The term "fraglich" refers to something that is uncertain or doubtful. It is commonly used to describe situations, statements, or claims that lack clarity or reliability. This word is often employed when discussing questionable or dubious matters, expressing skepticism, or highlighting the need for further investigation or clarification.

examples.german: Es ist fraglich, ob er die Prüfung bestehen wird.
examples.english: It is questionable whether he will pass the exam.

examples.german: Die Entscheidung über das Projekt ist noch fraglich.
examples.english: The decision about the project is still uncertain.

examples.german: Es ist fraglich, ob er seine Versprechen einhalten wird.
examples.english: It is doubtful whether he will keep his promises.

examples.german: Die Zukunft des Unternehmens ist fraglich.
examples.english: The future of the company is uncertain.

examples.german: Es ist fraglich, ob er die Wahrheit sagt.
examples.english: It is questionable whether he is telling the truth.
